attributes.action: Launch a public inquiry into the handling of grooming gang investigations.
attributes.additional_details: A public inquiry is essential to restore public trust, ensure accountability, and deliver justice for victims. Allegations of political interference and failures by authorities demand full transparency to prevent such failings in the future and protect vulnerable individuals from exploitation.
attributes.background: We urge the UK Government to hold a public inquiry into the failure of authorities to investigate grooming gangs and to examine the role of political figures and senior officials in the handling of these cases.
